  • Uses of Mat4 in camzup.kotlin

    Subclasses of Mat4 in camzup.kotlin 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  KtMat4
    Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional matrices.
    Methods in camzup.kotlin with parameters of type Mat4 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    KtMat4 KtMat4.minus​(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new matrix with the subtraction of the right operand from the instance.
    void KtMat4.minusAssign​(Mat4 b)
    Subtracts the right operand from the instance (mutates the matrix in place).
    KtMat4 KtMat4.plus​(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new matrix with the addition of the right operand to the instance.
    void KtMat4.plusAssign​(Mat4 b)
    Adds the right operand to the instance (mutates the matrix in place).
    KtMat4 KtMat4.times​(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new matrix with the product of the instance and the right operand.
    KtVec4 KtVec4.times​(Mat4 b)
    Returns a new vector with the product of the instance and the right operand.
    void KtMat4.timesAssign​(Mat4 b)
    Multiplies the right operand with the instance (mutates the matrix in place).
    void KtVec4.timesAssign​(Mat4 b)
    Multiplies the right operand with the instance (mutates the vector in place).
    Constructors in camzup.kotlin with parameters of type Mat4 
    Constructor Description
    KtMat4​(Mat4 source)
    Constructs a matrix from a source matrix's components.
